title: Yale's most popular class teaches 'happiness'
text:
Yale's most popular class teaches 'happiness' Wednesday, March 28, 2018 - 02:02 
The search for one of life's most elusive treasures - happiness - has driven nearly 1,200 students into an enormous concert hall at Yale University for its most popular class ever. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
